about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • AV-8B Night Attack (Rank 7 USA);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The AV-8B Night Attack is a VTOL multirole strike aircraft designed for close air support and deep strike operations.

It’s equipped with an inbuilt 25 mm GAU-12/U cannon with powerful incendiary and armor-piercing rounds, along with four AIM-9L air-to-air missiles and a large number of chaff and flares. Where it truly excels is ground ordnance; it can carry up to ten JDAM guided bombs, GBU-16 and GBU-12 Paveway II guided bombs, along with several types of AGM-65 Maverick missiles, aided by the thermal LITENING II targeting pod. On top of this, you can also equip multiple standard bombs and rockets of various calibers to mix and match the perfect loadout for any operation.

Armed to the teeth, the AV-8B is ready and able to take on any threat in the air or on the ground, thanks to its highly advanced avionics and weaponry.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • AV-8B Night Attack (Rank 7 USA);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The AV-8B Night Attack is a VTOL multirole strike aircraft designed for close air support and deep strike operations.

It’s equipped with an inbuilt 25 mm GAU-12/U cannon with powerful incendiary and armor-piercing rounds, along with four AIM-9L air-to-air missiles and a large number of chaff and flares. Where it truly excels is ground ordnance; it can carry up to ten JDAM guided bombs, GBU-16 and GBU-12 Paveway II guided bombs, along with several types of AGM-65 Maverick missiles, aided by the thermal LITENING II targeting pod. On top of this, you can also equip multiple standard bombs and rockets of various calibers to mix and match the perfect loadout for any operation.

Armed to the teeth, the AV-8B is ready and able to take on any threat in the air or on the ground, thanks to its highly advanced avionics and weaponry.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c

  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c

  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
